Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Tellapur Hyderabad
Description: Step into the future with this intelligently designed 3 BHK apartment located in the iconic Aliens Space Station project in Tellapur, Hyderabad. Just 15 minutes from the Financial District, this under-construction high-rise redefines modern living with its intelligent features, architectural innovation, and prime connectivity. Whether you are a homeowner seeking elegance or an investor focused on long-term growth, this property offers the best of both worlds.Property SpecificationsThis thoughtfully laid-out apartment spans 1769 sq ft and is located on the 22nd floor of a 30-storey tower. The flat is part of one of the most unique developments in Hyderabad, featuring tall glass walls that not only provide stunning panoramic views but also flood the home with abundant sunlight and natural ventilation throughout the day. The refreshing climate of Tellapur makes it possible to enjoy cool, cozy nights without even needing an air conditioner.The apartment comprises three spacious bedrooms, three well-appointed bathrooms, a wide living and dining space, one balcony, and a modern kitchen. The home is designed for convenience and elegance, offering both functional layout and high aesthetic value.FacilitiesAliens Space Station is more than just a residential complex. It is a technology-driven smart township. The apartment comes equipped with AI-powered CISCO home automation, allowing you to control your electronics via your smartphone or iPad. Entry to your home is secured through a biometric lock with remote access, making it easy to manage visitors even when you are away.The project also offers world-class amenities including a swimming pool, lush gardens and park spaces, children’s play areas, internal roads, and round-the-clock security. With the property facing the main road and the entire township surrounded by open spaces and a nearby fresh lake, the air circulation and ambient environment are unmatched in this region.LocalityTellapur is fast becoming one of the most sought-after real estate destinations in Hyderabad. Strategically located near the Financial District, Gachibowli, and HITEC City, the area offers seamless access to tech parks, reputed schools, hospitals, shopping malls, and entertainment centres. With robust infrastructure development, upcoming metro connectivity, and consistent urban planning, Tellapur is experiencing rapid growth.This location not only ensures daily convenience but also promises strong capital appreciation in the coming years, making it an excellent investment opportunity.View Property

Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Tellapur Hyderabad
Description: This spacious 3 BHK flat for sale in the sought-after locality of Tellapur, Hyderabad, is vaastu compliant and offers a north-east corner position with an east-facing entrance, ensuring positive energy and optimal living conditions. Property Specifications This 3 BHK flat situated on the ground floor offers a comfortable and well-furnished living space in a peaceful and scenic locality. The second balcony is located next to the kitchen, serving as a laundry area. The modular kitchen is well-equipped with cabinets, ensuring ample storage space and convenience for cooking. The kitchen is designed with practicality in mind, making it an ideal space for meal preparation.The living room is furnished with a wooden rack for the TV and other items, providing a neat and organized living space. The apartment offers 3 bathrooms, all of which are styled in a western fashion. One bathroom is attached to the master bedroom, while the other is attached to another bedroom, with the third bathroom serving as a common one. All bathrooms are fitted with modern fixtures, ensuring comfort and convenience. Facilities For electrical fixtures, the flat is equipped with lights and fans in every room, ensuring the home is well-lit and ventilated. As for amenities, the society is still under construction but will eventually feature common facilities such as a clubhouse and a swimming pool, which will add to the lifestyle experience of the residents. The flat offers ample parking space, with 2 car parking spots and 1 two-wheeler parking available. Security is a priority in the society, with CCTV surveillance installed for added safety. Locality Located in a thriving area, this flat is close to key local amenities such as Wipro Circle, Continental, and AMB Mall, making shopping and entertainment easily accessible. Public transport is also available, though for better convenience, you might need to travel a few km to access it, while cabs can be booked directly for easy travel around the city.View Property

Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Manikonda Hyderabad
Description: Nestled in the serene and picturesque locale of Manikonda, Hyderabad, this exceptional 3 BHK flat in the prestigious ASBL Lakeside development offers a harmonious blend of spaciousness, premium interiors, and a prime location, making it an irresistible choice for discerning home buyers seeking a luxurious living experience.Property SpecificationsBoasting an impressive super built-up area of 1836 sqft, this eighth-floor property is meticulously designed to adhere to the principles of Vaastu Shastra, with an east-facing orientation that ensures optimal natural light and auspicious energy flow throughout the space. The flat is furnished with premium-quality interiors and fittings, exuding a sense of elegance and sophistication. The flooring is adorned with exquisite vitrified tiles, adding to the overall aesthetic appeal.The three well-appointed bedrooms are complemented by three western-style bathrooms, with two being attached and one serving as a common facility. All bathrooms are equipped with geysers, providing residents with a convenient hot water supply.The property features two generously sized balconies, one attached to the living room and the other overlooking the captivating lake, hills, and open spaces, offering residents the opportunity to enjoy the refreshing outdoor environment. The modular kitchen is equipped with a chimney and a piped gas connection, ensuring a seamless cooking experience, while the adjoining utility area provides ample space for laundry and other household tasks.FacilitiesResidents can enjoy the convenience of a covered parking facility, ensuring the safety and accessibility of their vehicles. The property is equipped with a reliable 24-hour water supply and a 100 power backup facility, guaranteeing uninterrupted access to essential resources. For added security, the building is monitored by a dedicated security guard and a comprehensive CCTV surveillance system, providing a safe and secure environment for its occupants.The development boasts a host of modern lifestyle amenities, including a clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, party hall, childrens play area, badminton court, and a cycling and walking track, catering to the diverse needs and preferences of the community.LocalityStrategically located in Manikonda, Hyderabad, this 3 BHK flat in ASBL Lakeside is situated in close proximity to reputable schools within a 1 km radius and well-equipped hospitals within a 2 km radius, ensuring the convenience of families and professionals alike. The property is also conveniently located near popular shopping malls, supermarkets, banks, and ATMs, all within a 3 km radius, providing residents with easy access to essential services and amenities. The locality is well-connected, with public transportation, including buses and autos, readily available to facilitate your commuting needs.View Property

Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Manikonda Hyderabad(Khajaguda)
Description: Find a spacious 3 BHK flat in Khajaguda, Hyderabad, for sale with modern living and superior connectivity. This ready-to-move-in apartment has thoughtfully designed layouts and functional amenities for comfortable living.Property SpecificationsThis spacious 3 BHK flat offers a carpet area of 1840 sqft and is situated on the 2nd floor of a well-maintained 5-floor building. The flooring is in the form of good-quality vitrified tiles that contribute to beauty as well as strength. The entire design is Vaastu compliant, which ensures good energy flow across the house. With an eastern orientation, this flat enjoys plenty of natural light and ventilation, with a light and airy feel to the rooms. This flat is perfect for families looking for a comfortable, well-designed home in a quiet and convenient location.FacilitiesThe property has two stilt parking spaces so that there is ample and secure parking for residents. It is equipped with 24-hour water supply, so there is uninterrupted access to water at all times. There is a 100% power backup facility ensuring continuous power even during outages. Security is taken care of by having a guard on duty and CCTV surveillance facilities installed for added safety. Moreover, one lift is fitted in the building to ensure easy access to the higher floors.LocalityThe property is situated close to Lanco Hills Road, behind Niharika Exotica Apartments within Khajaguda, Gachibowli, with convenient access to major landmarks. Well-known schools such as DPS are nearby, with hospitals, malls, and supermarkets easily accessible for daily requirements. Public transport facilities are readily accessible with buses and autos plying frequently. The banking and ATM facilities are within handy proximity, and the railway and metro stations are merely 3 to 4 km away. The Outer Ring Road is also accessible at a mere 5-minute walk distance, providing impeccable connectivity.View Property

Title: 3 BHK Apartment for Sale in Madhapur Hyderabad(Kakatiya Hills Kavuri Hills)
Description: Experience serene living in this beautiful 3 BHK flat for sale in Kakatiya Hills, Kavuri Hills, Hyderabad Nestled away from the hustle and bustle of city traffic, this peaceful residence offers a perfect retreat for families seeking comfort and tranquility in a well-connected neighborhood. With a spacious carpet area of 1232 sqft, this vaastu compliant flat is located on the 4th floor of a well-maintained 4-story building and faces east, inviting plentiful natural light. The property comes fully furnished, designed for immediate occupancy with style and functionality in mind. It features three bedrooms, each with its own attached bathroom equipped with modern western fittings and geysers. The layout includes a separate living and dining area, making it ideal for entertaining guests. Enjoy the outdoors from two balconies-one attached to a bedroom and another linked to the living room, both providing views of the road and surrounding buildings. The modular kitchen is equipped with a chimney and has an attached utility area for added convenience. The flooring throughout the flat is finished with elegant tiles, enhancing the aesthetic appeal. This apartment includes covered parking for your vehicle and benefits from 24-hour water supply sourced from both borewell and corporation facilities. A 100 power backup ensures uninterrupted living, while the presence of a security guard and CCTV surveillance provides peace of mind. The building is equipped with one lift for easy access to all floors.View Property
